amendment.description: Amendment clarifies that the limitations in section 6 apply only to grants funded through the research, engineering and development account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to clarify that the provisions of the bill excluding from consideration any grant award not based on a competitive or merit-based process shall apply to grant awarded from the FAA Research, Engineering, and Development account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Morella amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
